title: Neo Pax Sivir
body: I HAVE SEND A TICKET TO RIOT I WENT TO PAX WEST AND GOT MY PAX SIVIR CODE BUT I AM FROM EUNE I SEND MY NAME SERVER AND CODE THROUGH A TICKET AND I STILL HAVE NO  ANSWERE I AM WORRIED CAUSE THE CODE IS GONNA EXPIRE IN 2 DAYS SO I DONT KNOW IF I AM GONNA GET IT PLEASE HELP ME

replies.body: Woah, slow down there on the caps friend!  Sorry to hear you're having trouble with the code, but you should be okay if you've put in a ticket.  A specialist will review your situation and help out, so don't worry about the expiration if you've already put a ticket in.  Hang tight!
btw how much does it to you to answere my ticket?
i didnt notice i had caps lock on
